item.title: Harnessing AI to Detect Anomalies During Aircraft Wing Manufacture
item.description: AI-driven anomaly detection enhances quality inspection in aircraft wing manufacturing.

item.description: Mahr Group completes acquisition of NanoFocus AG to strengthen its surface metrology portfolio.

item.description: Upgrading airbag yarn inspection with AI defect detection to meet rigorous automotive safety standards.
